description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Eldorado; or, Adventures in the path of Empire: comprising a voyage to California, via Panama, life in San Francisco and Monterey, pictures of the gold region, and experiences of Mexican travel. With illustrations by the author" Author: Taylor, Bayard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.b.29." Page: 295 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1850 Publisher: Richard Bentley Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003586871 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
